citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The past two IACUC meetings did not have a non-affiliated IACUC member as one had not yet been appointed by the
institutional official (IO). The IACUC must have a non-affiliated IACUC member which helps provide representation for the
general community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals. Ensure that the IO appoints at least one
member that is not affiliated in any way with the facility other than as a member of the Committee and that is not a
member of the immediate family of any person who is affiliated with the facility.
***Correct prior to any future IACUC meeting.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. No regulated animals were at the facility at
the time of inspection.
n

narrative:
2.31(b)(3)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The past two IACUC meetings did not have a non-affiliated IACUC member as one had not yet been appointed by the 
institutional official (IO). The IACUC must have a non-affiliated IACUC member which helps provide representation for the 
general community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals. Ensure that the IO appoints at least one 
member that is not affiliated in any way with the facility other than as a member of the Committee and that is not a 
member of the immediate family of any person who is affiliated with the facility. 
***Correct prior to any future IACUC meeting. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. No regulated animals were at the facility at 
the time of inspection. 
 
 n
